title: Latest News | Barry Andrews
snippet: Barry Andrews MEP welcomes steps by European Parliament to guarantee the security of the supply of medicines to Northern Ireland.

title: Barry Andrews: At the front, it's clear Ireland must continue to support Ukraine
snippet: If cuts to Ukrainian supports here are necessary, due to the accommodation crisis in Ireland, then we should make up that support in other ways, writes MEP Barry Andrews

title: Barry Andrews (politician) - Wikipedia
snippet: In June 2023, Andrews was the recipient of the Defence, Security and Space Award at The Parliament Magazine's annual MEP Awards. Barry Andrews is a member of the Committee on International Development, the Committee on International Trade, the Committee on Women's Rights and Gender Equality, the Delegation to the EU-UK Parliamentary Partnership Assembly, the Delegation to the EU-Turkey Joint Parliamentary Assembly and the Delegation for relations with South Africa.

title: Barry Andrews MEP For Dublin – Fianna Fáil Party Member
snippet: By focusing on minimising the effects on households through targeted government spending and tax reliefs, Barry is seeking effective and practical methods to manage issues surrounding the cost-of-living crisis.

title: ‘We messed up’ – MEP Barry Andrews on Fianna Fáil’s botched presidential election campaign | Irish Independent
snippet: Barry Andrews has said he has “no regrets” about his decision not to contest the presidential election and urged Fianna Fáil to he “honest” when it presents an internal party review into its failed campaign.
